Diamond::

She nodded,"Yes, I'm sure it is."  She looked at the machine and then 
at her wrists. "Would you happen to have a small saw by chance? I 
have something to take care of."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> DevilDuer looks from the machine to Diamond. "This piece of slag? 
> Jus' scans it and stuff. Gives me the programmin', and what the 
> necklace does and how it works. WIth any luck, it works by 
> transmittin' data back to the bot, in which case we can trace it 
back 
> to the bot and get 'im. My chips worked without any sort of data 
> transferr back to me, but ones that are effective are really hard 
and 
> expensive to produce, an' easy t' cancel out. Gets easier t' do 
stuff 
> yourself."
